Sentencas: Fuel starvation must be detected timely to avoid anode oxidation, especially for industrial-sized Solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Experimental investigation of fuel starvation on industrial-sized solid oxide fuel cells using segmented cathodes and area specific resistances

Sentencas: In this work, a practical segmented cell measurement method is developed to detect fuel starvation occurring in local regions.
Titulo: Experimental investigation of fuel starvation on industrial-sized solid oxide fuel cells using segmented cathodes and area specific resistances

Sentencas: For this developed method, the cathode of SOFCs is segmented, and only the voltage signal is measured in the segments.
Titulo: Experimental investigation of fuel starvation on industrial-sized solid oxide fuel cells using segmented cathodes and area specific resistances

Sentencas: The local current-voltage (I-V) curve per segment is determined using the local voltage and the global I-V curve.
Titulo: Experimental investigation of fuel starvation on industrial-sized solid oxide fuel cells using segmented cathodes and area specific resistances

Sentencas: Then, area specific resistance (ASR) is calculated and compared among segments to validate the data reliability.
Titulo: Experimental investigation of fuel starvation on industrial-sized solid oxide fuel cells using segmented cathodes and area specific resistances

Sentencas: Varieties of current density loading rates and fuel flow rates are correspondingly investigated.
Titulo: Experimental investigation of fuel starvation on industrial-sized solid oxide fuel cells using segmented cathodes and area specific resistances

Sentencas: Furthermore, fuel starvation is estimated using the rapid voltage drop in I-V curves and the rapid ASR increment in I-ASR curves.
Titulo: Experimental investigation of fuel starvation on industrial-sized solid oxide fuel cells using segmented cathodes and area specific resistances

Sentencas: The results show that the intrinsic ASR increment is a more sensitive and robust criterion to identify the occurrence of fuel starvation than the voltage drop.
Titulo: Experimental investigation of fuel starvation on industrial-sized solid oxide fuel cells using segmented cathodes and area specific resistances

Sentencas: This work will considerably benefit the progress of fuel starvation avoidance by setting a constant ASR threshold.
Titulo: Experimental investigation of fuel starvation on industrial-sized solid oxide fuel cells using segmented cathodes and area specific resistances
